*div1 type="summary"* *p*A. C. Ainsworth to Austin, Montgomery, Ala., December 19, 1832. Represents a number of planters in making certain inquiries concerning Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Montgomery. Alabama.*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="12-19-1832">Dec. 19th. 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Hon Sir,*/p*
*p*I have been requested by a number of respectable *person_mentioned*Planters */person_mentioned*in this vicinity, to solicit from you by letter, such information as prudent minds deem necessary, before determining on an emigration to your *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*—this request I hope will be an ample apology for the freedom I take in addressing you—*/p*
*p*The inquiries I am asked to make, are simply these—*/p*
*p*1st. What is the precise quantum of land, which a *person_mentioned*planter */person_mentioned*may depend on receiving as an inducement to become a *person_mentioned*citizen of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*?*/p*
*p*2nd. Will he be allowed to select pieces or *location_mentioned*parcels of land*/location_mentioned*, from any *location_mentioned*Section */location_mentioned*not otherwise disposed of?*/p*
*p*3rd. The expense requisite to secure to himself, a legal and indisputable title to such land, as under the established provisions he may take?*/p*
*p*4th. Can a man, bringing Capital into the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*purchase land, adjoining that, granted by Government?*/p*
*p*5th. What distinction is made, as regards quantity of land, between *person_mentioned*planters */person_mentioned*with, and *person_mentioned*planters */person_mentioned*without, *person_mentioned*families*/person_mentioned*?*/p*
*p*6th. Do your laws affect the tenure of *person_mentioned*Slave */person_mentioned*property—if so, what is best method of avoiding such inconvenience:*/p*
*p*7th. Must a *person_mentioned*planter*/person_mentioned*, previous to opening land sufficient to afford subsistence for his *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned*, pay for food, clothing and other necessaries, an extravagant price?*/p*
*p*8th, Have you good *location_mentioned*schools */location_mentioned*for the education of *person_mentioned*children*/person_mentioned*?*/p*
*p*9th. What is the cheapest, most expeditious and secure route *location_mentioned*from Alabama to your Colony*/location_mentioned*—and can wagons pass conveniently from here, there?*/p*
*p*10th. Are its soil and climate, as rich and good (in your opinion) as the soil and climate of *location_mentioned*Alabama */location_mentioned*or *location_mentioned*Mississippi */location_mentioned*?*/p*
*p*The many extravagant and contradictory accounts of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, now afloat in this *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, are cause of such particularity in my questions—for the sake of those *person_mentioned*Planters */person_mentioned*who have employed me to conduct this correspondence, I hope you will [be] able to glean time sufficient from the duties to which doubtless you are pressingly called, to answer them fully— the facts, which in their behalf, I seek to obtain, were they generally understood, would bring your *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*an accession of some of our most sturdy and valuable *person_mentioned*Planters*/person_mentioned*—good *person_mentioned*husbands*/person_mentioned*—good *person_mentioned*fathers */person_mentioned*and as a consequence, *person_mentioned*amiable members of society*/person_mentioned*—Though it is not connected with the questions asked above, I would for my own information enquire, whether the *person_mentioned*friends of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* can look with much certainty to a period when the *person_mentioned*Government of that *location_mentioned*Province*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* shall assume a different—perhaps an independent form—such a change would be prodigal of influence and importance, and do more than any other measure perhaps, to awaken the *location_mentioned*world*/location_mentioned*, and particularly the *location_mentioned*U. States*/location_mentioned*, to the value of its natural resources and probable merit of its political institutions— Should my enquiry meet your approbation, your views on this, as on the other subjects mentioned, will be received thankfully, and read with intense interest—*/p*
*p*As *person_mentioned*attorney for my clients*/person_mentioned*, and from the esteem I have for your character,*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*A. C. AlNSWORTH*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*P. S. Will you also inform me, what chance (if any) there is in your settlement for a young and persevering *person_mentioned*Lawyer*/person_mentioned*? I am a *person_mentioned*native of *location_mentioned*Providence in Rhode-Island*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*—settled in this town—as I am so far from the " household hearth " and home's familiar voices, already, I would not object [to] a compliance with the solicitation of my *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*to accompany them (supposing they go) if I can do as well even, there, as I am doing now in this place.*/p*
*p*Excuse these repeated requests, and believe me,*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*A. C. AINSWORTH*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Hon. Austin*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Honr. Austin*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*St Felippe De Austin Brassora Texas */person_mentioned*Pr *person_mentioned*Mr John A Barkley*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
